message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a game-changer, and I'm excited to discuss the price with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $11,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $11,000 is a little steep for me. Would you consider $9,000?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $11,000 might be a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,500. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value it will bring to your business.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  $10,500 is still a bit high for my budget. Would you be willing to come down to $9,750?

Hi Bob, I understand that $9,750 is still a bit above your budget. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,250. I think this is the lowest price I can offer and still make a reasonable profit.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  How about we settle at $10,000?  That would be a fair compromise.
